name: OR_LNLG_COUNTS_NEEDLESIZE
description: The OR_LNLG_COUNTS_NEEDLESIZE table contains information about the size of the missing needle.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COUNT_NEEDLE_SIZE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value for the size of the missing needle.
